Key Match Events: Sorba Thomas had a goal disallowed for offside.
Baris Yilmaz received a second yellow card and was sent off, reducing Turkey to 10 men.
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy took charge of his first match as head coach of the Welsh national team.
Turkey reached the quarter-finals of Euro 2024 and are in fine form.
Craig Bellamy emphasized a new progressive style of play for Wales.
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy's debut as head coach was marked by a promising performance despite the goalless draw.
Welsh fans were encouraged by the team's exciting football under Bellamy.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Cardiff City Stadium.
Aaron Ramsey and Ethan Ampadu were key players for Wales.
The match ended in a 0-0 draw.
